description: This program reads in a GE cdiflist and outputs gradient file and file of bvalues for subsequent processing.

cdiflist.title: Cdiflist file
cdiflist.description: Name(s) of cdiflist text file output by GE scanners when acquiring DWIs.

bval_max.title: Maximum bvalue
bval_max.description: Max bvalue used, which provides a reference value for scaling everything else.

prefix.title: Output prefix
prefix.description: Output basename for the subsequent grad and bvalue files (suffix and extensions will be added).

date.title: Date flag
date.description: Display release/editing date of current version.
